mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tb_bbs_${table_name} ( seq int4 NOT NULL, title varchar(255) NOT NULL, content text, reg_dt timestamp, reg_usr varchar(64), mod_dt timestamp, mod_usr varchar(64), PRIMARY KEY (seq) )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT bbs_seq, bbs_name, bbs_id, CASE WHEN use_attach = '1' THEN true ELSE false end use_attach, reg_usr, reg_dt, mod_usr, mod_dt FROM TB_BBS_REF
AND title LIKE '%'||#{KEYWORD}||'%'
ORDER BY bbs_seq DESC ) A ) A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.RNUM > (#{PAGE} - 1) * #{PAGESIZE} AND A.RNUM <= #{PAGE} * #{PAGESIZE}
SELECT bbs_seq, bbs_name, bbs_id, CASE WHEN use_attach = '1' THEN true ELSE false end use_attach, reg_usr, reg_dt, mod_usr, mod_dt FROM TB_BBS_REF WHERE bbs_seq = #{bbs_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BBS_REF ( bbs_seq, bbs_name, bbs_id, use_attach, reg_usr, reg_dt, mod_usr, mod_dt ) VALUES ( nextval('sq_tb_bbs_ref'), #{bbs_name}, #{bbs_id}, CASE WHEN #{use_attach} = true THEN '1' ELSE '0' end, #{reg_usr}, now(), #{mod_usr}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BBS_REF SET bbs_name = #{bbs_name}, use_attach = CASE WHEN #{use_attach} = true THEN '1' ELSE '0' end, mod_dt = now(), mod_usr = #{mod_usr} WHERE bbs_seq = cast(#{bbs_seq} as integer)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_BBS_REF WHERE bbs_seq = CAST(#{bbs_seq} as integer)
